docs.snippet: A heavy veil of secrecy was flung by both Berlin and London yester  day over the fate of a British convoy in mid-Atlantic reported shelled on Tuesday oy a Nazi raider and the fate of the raider, too, understood to be hunted by British warships.
docs.lead_paragraph: A heavy veil of secrecy was flung by both Berlin and London yester day over the fate of a British convoy in mid-Atlantic reported shelled on Tuesday oy a Nazi raider and the fate of the raider, too, understood to be hunted by British warships.

headline.main: DEMOCRACY VICTOR, SAY LATIN NATIONS; President's Re-election Hailed as Triumph of Principles for Which Americas Stand ELECTION HELD EXAMPLE Republics to South Inspired by Spectacle, of 50 Millions Expressing Free Choice Triumph of Democracy" Called "an Elder Brother" Result Heartens Chile Satisfaction in Colombia Ecuadoreans Gratified

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 6--General understandings have been reached with virtually all the Latin American countries by which United States forces would be permitted to use air and naval bases to the south if that should be considered necessary for...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 6--General understandings have been reached with virtually all the Latin American countries by which United States forces would be permitted to use air and naval bases to the south if that should be considered necessary for hemisphere defense.
docs.abstract: accords reptd reached; leasing method barred to avoid sovereignty problem
